scripts.postinstall: yarn build.linux && yarn build.mac && yarn build.win32
scripts.build.linux: cp src/index.js index.js && sed -e s/PLATFORM/linux/g -i index.js && node index.js
scripts.build.mac: cp src/index.js index.js && sed -e s/PLATFORM/mac/g -i index.js && node index.js
scripts.build.win32: cp src/index.js index.js && sed -e s/PLATFORM/win32/g -i index.js && node index.js
